title: Tech Update
description: An interactive and responsive blogging platform where logged-in users can create, update, and manage posts, while unregistered users can only view existing content. Designed with a clean UI to ensure seamless content browsing and management.

title: Virtual Classroom
description: A modern virtual classroom platform built with React, Redux, and Firebase. It includes video conferencing, interactive whiteboard, real-time chat, file sharing, and teacher-specific participation tracking for seamless online learning.

title: Image Search Engine
description: A responsive image search engine built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It fetches images from the Unsplash API based on user input and displays them in a grid layout with a 'Show More' option for pagination.

title: Dice Game
description: The Dice Game is a simple and fun number guessing game built to test your luck.

title: GitHub Profile Finder
description: Built a React application that allows users to search and view GitHub profiles using the GitHub API. Displays profile details, repositories, followers, and following with a clean and responsive UI.
